name: Csci462
body:
### Welcome to the TSD repository

### To run the project you need to:
+ download the zip
+ unpack and locate install.bat in the TSD installation folder (you can also just copy the dist folder to anywhere you want)
+ run install.bat (it will install all of the required software)
+ locate the TSD project in your C directory
+ run the exe

### Required software:
+ Python 2.7 or higher
+ Windows 7
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
